entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:41 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 09:13 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: E 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 1300 metres this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 06:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers except snow over higher terrain overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to near valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 06:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except snow over higher terrain early in the morning. Snow level rising to 1500 metres near noon. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 06:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
